alert.note: Alert for Kootenai (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 18 at 5:54AM MDT until further notice by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of North Idaho, including the following county, Kootenai. * WHEN...Until 800 AM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 451 AM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms just to the southeast of Dalton Gardens and northeast of Fernan Lake Village. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.75 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Portions of eastern Coeur d`Alene and Fernan Lake Village. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
